model.name: Team
model.metadata: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE Team (TeamObject Object OPTIONS (NAMEINSOURCE 'this', SEARCHABLE 'Unsearchable'), teamName varchar(255) PRIMARY KEY) OPTIONS (NAMEINSOURCE 'teams');

model.name: TeamView
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW Players ( TeamName varchar(255) PRIMARY KEY, PlayerName varchar(255) ) AS SELECT t.TeamName, y.Name FROM Team as T, OBJECTTABLE('m.players' PASSING T.TeamObject as m COLUMNS Name string 'teiid_row') as y;
